Title: Enacts the "COVID-19 Foreclosure Relief Act of 2021"
Summary: Enacts the "COVID-19 Foreclosure Relief Act of 2021" to provide a property tax reimbursement program for regulated institutions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to enacting the "COVID-19 Foreclosure Relief Act of 2021"; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
